mapper.sql: news_id AS "newsId", news_token AS "newsToken", words_num AS "wordsNum", generated_keywords AS "generatedKeywords", news_category AS "newsCategory", news_source AS "newsSource", news_title AS "newsTitle", title_token AS "titleToken", title_lading AS "titleLading", inborn_keywords AS "inbornKeywords", news_time AS "newsTime", news_url AS "newsUrl", news_author AS "newsAuthor", news_content AS "newsContent",key_words AS "keyWords", content_lading AS "contentLading", lang_type AS "langType", crawl_source AS "crawlSource", crawl_time AS "crawlTime", news_pictures AS "newsPictures", news_video AS "newsVideo", news_encode AS "newsEncode", news_tendency AS "newsTendency", is_seged AS "isSeged", update_time AS "updateTime", has_video AS "hasVideo", is_sensitive AS "isSensitive", sensitive_words AS "sensitiveWords",sensitive_category AS "sensitiveCategory", websitename AS "websitename"

t1.news_id AS "newsId", t1.news_token AS "newsToken", t1.words_num AS "wordsNum", t1.generated_keywords AS "generatedKeywords", t1.news_category AS "newsCategory", t1.news_source AS "newsSource", t1.news_title AS "newsTitle", t1.title_token AS "titleToken", t1.title_lading AS "titleLading", t1.inborn_keywords AS "inbornKeywords", t1.news_time AS "newsTime", t1.news_url AS "newsUrl", t1.news_author AS "newsAuthor", t1.news_content AS "newsContent", t1.key_words AS "keyWords", t1.content_lading AS "contentLading", t1.lang_type AS "langType", t1.crawl_source AS "crawlSource", t1.crawl_time AS "crawlTime", t1.news_pictures AS "newsPictures", t1.news_video AS "newsVideo", t1.news_encode AS "newsEncode", t1.news_tendency AS "newsTendency", t1.is_seged AS "isSeged", t1.update_time AS "updateTime", t1.has_video AS "hasVideo", t1.is_sensitive AS "isSensitive", t1.sensitive_words AS "sensitiveWords",t1.sensitive_category AS "sensitiveCategory", t1.websitename AS "websitename"
mapper.select:
select
from news where 1 = 1
and news_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsId},'%')
and news_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsToken},'%')
and words_num like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.wordsNum},'%')
and generated_keywords like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.generatedKeywords},'%')
and news_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsCategory},'%')
and news_source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsSource},'%')
and news_title like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTitle},'%')
and title_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.titleToken},'%')
and title_lading like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.titleLading},'%')
and inborn_keywords like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inbornKeywords},'%')
and news_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTime},'%')
and news_url like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsUrl},'%')
and news_author like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsAuthor},'%')
and news_content like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsContent},'%')
and key_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%')
and content_lading like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contentLading},'%')
and lang_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.langType},'%')
and crawl_source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.crawlSource},'%')
and crawl_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.crawlTime},'%')
and news_pictures like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsPictures},'%')
and news_video like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsVideo},'%')
and news_encode like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsEncode},'%')
and news_tendency like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTendency},'%')
and is_seged like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isSeged},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and has_video like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.hasVideo},'%')
and is_sensitive like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isSensitive},'%')
and sensitive_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveWords},'%')
and sensitive_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveCategory},'%')
and websitename like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.websitename},'%')

select
from news where 1 = 1
and news_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsId},'%')
and news_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsToken},'%')
and words_num like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.wordsNum},'%')
and generated_keywords like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.generatedKeywords},'%')
and news_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsCategory},'%')
and news_source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsSource},'%')
and news_title like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTitle},'%')
and title_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.titleToken},'%')
and title_lading like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.titleLading},'%')
and inborn_keywords like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inbornKeywords},'%')
and news_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTime},'%')
and news_url like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsUrl},'%')
and news_author like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsAuthor},'%')
and news_content like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsContent},'%')
and key_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%')
and content_lading like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contentLading},'%')
and lang_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.langType},'%')
and crawl_source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.crawlSource},'%')
and crawl_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.crawlTime},'%')
and news_pictures like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsPictures},'%')
and news_video like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsVideo},'%')
and news_encode like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsEncode},'%')
and news_tendency like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTendency},'%')
and is_seged like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isSeged},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and has_video like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.hasVideo},'%')
and is_sensitive like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isSensitive},'%')
and sensitive_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveWords},'%')
and sensitive_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveCategory},'%')
and websitename like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.websitename},'%')

select
from news where 1 = 1
and news_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsId},'%')
and news_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsToken},'%')
and words_num like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.wordsNum},'%')
and generated_keywords like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.generatedKeywords},'%')
and news_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsCategory},'%')
and news_source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsSource},'%')
and news_title like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTitle},'%')
and title_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.titleToken},'%')
and title_lading like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.titleLading},'%')
and inborn_keywords like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inbornKeywords},'%')
and news_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTime},'%')
and news_url like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsUrl},'%')
and news_author like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsAuthor},'%')
and news_content like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsContent},'%')
and key_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%')
and content_lading like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contentLading},'%')
and lang_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.langType},'%')
and crawl_source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.crawlSource},'%')
and crawl_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.crawlTime},'%')
and news_pictures like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsPictures},'%')
and news_video like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsVideo},'%')
and news_encode like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsEncode},'%')
and news_tendency like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTendency},'%')
and is_seged like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isSeged},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and has_video like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.hasVideo},'%')
and is_sensitive like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isSensitive},'%')
and sensitive_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveWords},'%')
and sensitive_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveCategory},'%')
and websitename like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.websitename},'%')
order by news_time DESC

select
from news AS t1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(0.9*(SELECT MAX(news_id) FROM `news`)) AS news_id) AS t2 where 1=1 and t1.news_id >= t2.news_id and t1.is_sensitive is not null
and t1.lang_type = #{paramCondition.langType}
and t1.is_sensitive = #{paramCondition.isSensitive}
and t1.websitename like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.websitename},'%')
and t1.sensitive_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveWords},'%')
and t1.key_words like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%')
and t1.sensitive_category like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sensitiveCategory},'%')
and (t1.news_time between CONCAT(#{paramCondition.beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{paramCondition.endTime},' 23:59:59'))
ORDER BY t1.news_id DESC ,t1.sensitive_category ASC
SELECT t.lang_type,COUNT(*) AS num FROM news t GROUP BY t.lang_type ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT t1.news_category,COUNT(*) AS num FROM news AS t1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(0.9*(SELECT MAX(news_id) FROM `news`)) AS news_id) AS t2 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.news_id >= t2.news_id and t1.news_category is not null
and t1.lang_type =#{paramCondition.langType}
and (t1.news_time between CONCAT(#{paramCondition.beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{paramCondition.endTime},' 23:59:59'))
GROUP BY t1.news_category ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT YEAR(news_time) as yearTime, MONTH( news_time) as monthTime, CONCAT(YEAR(news_time),'-',MONTH(news_time)) AS dataTime , COUNT(IF(lang_type="cn",1,NULL)) AS cn, COUNT(IF(lang_type="zang",1,NULL)) AS zang, COUNT(IF(lang_type="wei",1,NULL)) AS wei, COUNT(IF(lang_type="meng",1,NULL)) AS meng FROM news GROUP BY dataTime ORDER BY yearTime DESC,monthTime DESC

SELECT YEAR(news_time) as yearTime, MONTH( news_time) as monthTime, CONCAT(YEAR(news_time),'-',MONTH(news_time)) AS data_time , COUNT(1) AS total, COUNT(IF(is_sensitive=1,1,NULL)) AS neuNum, COUNT(IF(is_sensitive=2,2,NULL)) AS senNum, COUNT(IF(is_sensitive=3,3,NULL)) AS forNum FROM news GROUP BY data_time ORDER BY yearTime DESC,monthTime DESC

select
from news where 1 = 1
and news_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsId},'%')
and news_token like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsToken},'%')
and words_num like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.wordsNum},'%')

and news_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.newsTime},'%')
